May.2014 – Dec.2017        International Autoimmunity Product Manager – Werfen - Milan, Italy  
   
Area:   International Marketing, Customer Technical Support and Sales  
Job description:  
 Develop and deliver training to distributors, technical sales representatives and customers for the 
EEMEAI  Area  (East Europe, Middle East, Africa, India and a lso North Europe and Russia); and scientific 
seminar organization.  
Planning and delivering CRM strategies across the company encouraging customer retention and 
customer loyalty. Ensuring the database is segmented effectively for targeted marketing activities.  
Interface with Technical Servi ce and Regulatory/Quality to support and manage successful resolution 
of customer technical issues, initiate product improvements, launch new products and maintain and 
grow business.  
Work with the Sales Management team to develop sales and support trade show and exhibition 
strategy.  Develop global key opinion leader network in the field of autoimmunity . 
   
June  2013 – Nov. 201 3 
 In Vitro Expansion of Human Hepatic Stem Cells  - WFIRM (Wake Forest Institute for Regenerative

Area:   R&D Health Department - Liver Regeneration Laboratory  
Job description:  
 
 
 
 
 
Nov.2012  – June 2013  
 
 
 
Area:  
Job Description:  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  Isolation, seeding and harvesting of human fetal liver stem cells, 2D, 3D and Suspension Culture of liver 
stem cells, PCR, DNA and RNA extraction and quantification, electrophoresis, immunofluorescence 
staining, microtome, embed in Paraffin.  
 
 
CTB (Biomedical Technology Center)  
 
 
Functionalization of silk protein from Bombyx mori with bioactive peptides to modulate cellular 
behavior.  
This work is included in a subproject of NEUROTEC CM plan developed to regenerate damaged 
neuronal tissue with mesenchymal stem cells together with fibroin scaffold.
